AmplitudeMin: An amplitude of 0.25 would oscillate between 0.75 and 1.25.
AmplitudeMax: An amplitude of 0.25 would oscillate between 0.75 and 1.25.
FrequencyMin: A frequency of 20 would oscillate at 10Hz.
FrequencyMax: A frequency of 20 would oscillate at 10Hz.
OffsetMin: Offset into the sine wave. Value modded by 2 * PI.
OffsetMax: Offset into the sine wave. Value modded by 2 * PI.
CenterMin: A center of 0.5 would oscillate around 0.5.
CenterMax: A center of 0.5 would oscillate around 0.5.
